def aa_percentage(seq, residues=["A", "I", "L", "M", "F", "W", "Y", "V"]):
  return round(sum(seq.count(r) for r in residues)/len(seq)*100)

def aa_percentage(seq, acid='AILMFWYV'):
    return round(sum(x in acid for x in seq) * 100 / len(seq) )

def aa_percentage(protein, residue="AILMFWYV"):
    return round(100 * sum(protein.count(aa) for aa in set(residue)) / len(protein))

def aa_percentage(seq, targets=["A", "I", "L", "M", "F", "W", "Y", "V"]):
    return round(sum([seq.count(ch) for ch in targets])/len(seq)*100)

def aa_percentage(seq, codes = ["A","I","L","M","F","W","Y","V"]):
    return round(100 * len([x for x in seq if x in codes]) / len(seq))
